generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a curved path, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, with pedestrians standing on it, and it is separated from the road by a curb.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including a multi-story brick building on the left and commercial buildings on the right.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign and another with a parking sign.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing down is visible on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass on the sidewalk near the right edge of the image.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the side of the road, including a black car on the left and a red car in the middle.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road, next to the motorcycle.
